Topics: Gaussian-Bernoulli RBM
Inputs     are unbounded reals
add a quadratic term to the energy function


only thing that changes is that            is now a Gaussian distribution with mean                     and identity covariance matrix
recommended to normalize the training set by
subtracting the mean of each input
dividing each input       by the training set standard deviation
should use a smaller learning rate than in the regular RBM

We saw what is a restricted Boltzmann machine and how to train it with Contrastive Divergence
It assumes the observations are binary (Bernoulli), but variations support other types:
Rate-coded Restricted Boltzmann Machines for Face Recognition. Yee Whye Teh and Geoffrey Hinton, 2001
Replicated Softmax: an Undirected Topic Model.  Ruslan Salakhutdinov and Geoffrey Hinton, 2009
Training Restricted Boltzmann Machines on Word Observations. George Dahl, Ryan Adam and Hugo Larochelle, 2012
